com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class CollapsibleContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.Container
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorComponent, DraggableContainer, ToggleableContainer

    public class CollapsibleContainer
extends Container
    Container that can be closed, so that its child component.
